languages.text: "Те несчастные ублюдки с Веабос-6, которых ты продавал пиратам? Ха! В предприимчивости тебе не откажешь — всегда найдешь, где извлечь выгоду!"
"Those poor bastards from Vheabos VI whom you sold to the pirates? Ha! You are an enterprising sort, I'll give you that — you always find a way to turn a profit!"
languages.original_text: "Те несчастные ублюдки с Веабос-6, которых ты продавал пиратам? Ха! В предприимчивости тебе не откажешь — всегда найдешь, где извлечь выгоду!"

traits.locale_text: "Those poor bastards from Vheabos VI whom you sold to the pirates? Ha! You are an enterprising sort, I'll give you that — you always find a way to make profit!"
"Those poor bastards from Vheabos VI whom you sold to the pirates? Ha! You are an enterprising sort, I'll give you that — you always find a way to make profit!"
"Those poor bastards from Vheabos VI whom you sold to the pirates? Ha! You are an enterprising sort, I'll give you that — you always find a way to turn a profit!"
"Those poor bastards from Vheabos VI whom you sold to the pirates? Ha! You are an enterprising sort, I'll give you that — you always find a way to turn a profit!"
"Those poor bastards from Vheabos VI whom you sold to the pirates? Ha! You are an enterprising sort, I'll give you that — you always find a way to turn a profit!"

languages.text: « Ces pauvres types de Vhéabos-VI que vous avez vendus aux pirates ? Ha ! Vous avez le sens des affaires, je vous l'accorde, vous trouvez toujours un moyen de vous enrichir ! »
languages.original_text: "Those poor bastards from Vheabos VI whom you sold to the pirates? Ha! You are an enterprising sort, I'll give you that — you always find a way to turn a profit!"

traits.locale_text: « Ces pauvres types de Vhéabos-VI que vous avez vendus aux pirates ? Ha ! Vous avez le sens des affaires, je vous l'accorde, vous trouvez toujours un moyen de vous enrichir ! »

languages.text: «¿Esos pobres desgraciados de Vheabos VI que vendió a los piratas? ¡Ja! Su capacidad para los negocios es sorprendente, lo admito. ¡Siempre encuentra la forma de sacar tajada!».
languages.original_text: "Those poor bastards from Vheabos VI whom you sold to the pirates? Ha! You are an enterprising sort, I'll give you that — you always find a way to turn a profit!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Esos pobres desgraciados de Vheabos VI que vendió a los piratas? ¡Ja! Su capacidad para los negocios es sorprendente, lo admito. ¡Siempre encuentra la forma de sacar tajada!».

languages.text: 「お前が海賊に売った、ヴィアボス・VIの愚か者たち？ハッ！お前は実に新進的なのだな。俺が認めてやる。いつだって、利益に変える術を見つけ出すのだから！」
languages.original_text: "Those poor bastards from Vheabos VI whom you sold to the pirates? Ha! You are an enterprising sort, I'll give you that — you always find a way to turn a profit!"

traits.locale_text: 「お前が海賊に売った、ヴィアボス・VIの愚か者たち？ハッ！お前は実に新進的なのだな。俺が認めてやる。いつだって、利益に変える術を見つけ出すのだから！」

languages.text: “你是指维博斯六号星那群可怜的杂种，被你卖给海盗当奴隶吗？哈！我得承认，你是个相当有事业心的家伙，总能找到办法赚钱！”
languages.original_text: "Those poor bastards from Vheabos VI whom you sold to the pirates? Ha! You are an enterprising sort, I'll give you that — you always find a way to turn a profit!"

traits.locale_text: “你是指维博斯六号星那群可怜的杂种，被你卖给海盗当奴隶吗？哈！我得承认，你是个相当有事业心的家伙，总能找到办法赚钱！”

languages.text: "Diese armen Schweine von Vheabos-VI, die Ihr an die Piraten verkauft habt? Ha! Ihr seid wirklich geschäftstüchtig, das muss ich Euch lassen ... Ihr findet immer einen Weg, Gewinn zu machen!"
languages.original_text: "Those poor bastards from Vheabos VI whom you sold to the pirates? Ha! You are an enterprising sort, I'll give you that — you always find a way to turn a profit!"

traits.locale_text: "Diese armen Schweine von Vheabos-VI, die Ihr an die Piraten verkauft habt? Ha! Ihr seid wirklich geschäftstüchtig, das muss ich Euch lassen ... Ihr findet immer einen Weg, Gewinn zu machen!"

languages.text: "Korsanlara sattığın şu Vheabos VI'dan gelen zavallılar mı? Ha! Girişimci bir ruha sahip olduğunu inkâr edemem. Her zaman kâr elde etmeyi biliyorsun!"
languages.original_text: "Those poor bastards from Vheabos VI whom you sold to the pirates? Ha! You are an enterprising sort, I'll give you that — you always find a way to turn a profit!"
